thread.title: Banking System Alarm Bell That Doesn’t Signal Danger

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Banking System Alarm Bell That Doesn’t Signal Danger

organizations.name: banking system alarm bell that doesn’t signal danger

text:
A crisis-era red light is flashing and provoking old fears about banks. But the world has changed a lot since 2008: this signal no longer means banks are struggling to find cash.
The basic cost of money lent between banks has seen a sharp rise over recent weeks. In the U.S., the cost to borrow over three months has risen much faster than the Federal Reserve has raised interest rates.
